translations: v.痛饮狂欢（carouse 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: They told him to stay home with his wife instead of going out and carousing with friends.
sentences.translation: 他们告诉他与他的妻子在一起呆在家里，不要出去和朋友们一起痛饮狂欢。

sentences.sentence: A young couple was out carousing one evening.
sentences.translation: 一天晚上，一对年轻夫妇出门痛饮。

sentences.sentence: A hard-partying playboy has been spoiled by years of carousing.
sentences.translation: 寻欢作乐的花花公子在多年的放纵后已变得颓废不堪。
